name: @cocalc/cdn
description: Files that CoCalc uses that would be natural in various contexts to get from a CDN

scripts.build: rm -rf build dist && mkdir build && cp -rv *.json *.py *.js build/ && cp -rv cm-custom-theme build/ && cd build && npm ci && mkdir dist && ./setup.py && mv dist .. && cd .. && rm -rf build

author: SageMath, Inc.
